segments.text: Johnny , I want to thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean , Mom ? For breaking your best china ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Johnny , that stuff was dollar store junk . No , I want to thank you for keeping Grandma busy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's more like she kept me busy ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , and normally she's trying to tell me how to clean my house . So , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Am I back in your good books ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not only that , but I'm going to buy you that video game after all !
segments.speaker: S1
